channel.title: Xlinescape
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/2171/xlinescape.png[/img]
Welcome to my server project thread.
[size=10pt]History[/size]
Almost 2 years ago i made a pimpscape based pk server which was a big success. It was hosted on a low end dedicated server and at peak time it hit 100 players.
What Next Well after making a client for a hugh server 2spec and then later realsing it with many people loving it i decided to create my own server.
About it The server is dodian based and the client is based of the version i posted in the download section.
Whats been done so far.
Client First i got a clean cache for the client so no more model glitchs and used a new way to load the models into the client with out damaging the cache. I fixed many bug in the client inculding the mapback issues and chatbox.
Server Been creating a home area Building an money making system basic combat training Few basic skills Clanchat mining,runecrafting,firemaking are done More small updates will improve this soon A good version of barrows Most non combat skills can be trained
Pictures [CENTER][IMG]http://www.xlinescape.com/pictures/mutli2.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://www.xlinescape.com/pictures/xlineclient.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://xlinescape.com/pictures/clanchat.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://www.xlinescape.com/pictures/mp3player.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://www.xlinescape.com/pictures/downloadmp3.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://www.xlinescape.com/pictures/dags.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://xlinescape.com/pictures/dajgmul.PNG[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/v/sZ2yHXMa7C4&hl http://www.youtube.com/v/3-5lRg1mL5A&hl
Testing Currently me and 2 good friends are testing as the server been developed In 2-3 weeks will plan for a open beta.If all goes well we plan to host it on a dedicated server for best uptime and performance.
Other info
Thanks for reading my project thread i will improve as my project gains in size

item.title: Xlinescape

item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to my server project thread.

[size=10pt]History[/size]

Almost 2 years ago i made a pimpscape based pk server which was a big success. It was hosted on a low end dedicated server and at peak time it hit 100 players.

What Next
Well after making a client for a hugh server 2spec and then later realsing it with many people loving it i decided to create my own server.

About it
The server is dodian based and the client is based of the version i posted in the download section.

Whats been done so far.

Client
First i got a clean cache for the client so no more model glitchs and used a new way to load the models into the client with out damaging the cache.
I fixed many bug in the client inculding the mapback issues and chatbox.

Server
Been creating a home area
Building an money making system
basic combat training
Few basic skills
Clanchat
mining,runecrafting,firemaking are done
More small updates will improve this soon
A good version of barrows
Most non combat skills can be trained

Testing
Currently me and 2 good friends are testing as the server been developed In 2-3 weeks will plan for a open beta.If all goes well we plan to host it on a dedicated server for best uptime and performance.
